joelib2.io
Class MoleculeFileHelper

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.io.MoleculeFileHelper

public class MoleculeFileHelper
extends Object

Factory class to get loader/writer classes.

getMolReader

public static MoleculeFileIO getMolReader(InputStream is,
                                          IOType type)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          MoleculeIOException
Gets the molReader attribute of the JOEFileFormat class.
MoleculeFileType loader = JOEFileFormat.getMolReader(InputStream is, IOType type)
if (loader.readable())
{
  boolean success = loader.read(is, mol, title);
  return success;
}
else
{
  logger.warn(type.getRepresentation() + " is not readable.");
  return false;
}

Parameters:
is - Description of the Parameter
type - Description of the Parameter
Returns:
The molReader value
Throws:
IOException - Description of the Exception
MoleculeIOException - Description of the Exception

getMolWriter

public static MoleculeFileIO getMolWriter(OutputStream os,
                                          IOType type)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          MoleculeIOException
Description of the Method
MoleculeFileType saver = JOEFileFormat.getMolWrite(OutputStream os, IOType type)
if (saver.writeable())
{
boolean success = saver.write(os, mol, title);
return success;
}
else
{
logger.warn(type.getRepresentation() + " is not writeable.");
return false;
}

Parameters:
os - Description of the Parameter
type - Description of the Parameter
Returns:
Description of the Return Value
Throws:
IOException - Description of the Exception

                                throws IOException,

Loads a single molecule from a file.

Parameters:
loader - the loader class (array with one element) for open molecule input stream
mol - the molecule in which the first molecule will be stored
inputFile - the input file
type - the input type

the loaded molecule
